content.instruction: You are a professional annotator specializing in extracting structured graph representations from technical manual diagrams.
inputs: A Roadway work-zone layout from Work Zone Field Manual with notes and constrains.
task: Extract a hierarchical graph representation of the layout
Capture all relevant entities and their relationships
Extract constraints and rules associated with the entities
rules: Organize the graph into hierarchical levels: Level 1 (roadway components), Level 2 (control devices), Level 3 (buffers/spacings)
List each entity with attributes such as type, placement, size, distance, and condition
Explicitly describe relationships using phrases like 'includes', 'protected by', 'connected to', 'placed at distance from', 'governed by rule'
